Name: Infinite Flame Circle
Desc: Generates an Endless Cycle of Phoenix. This is a kind of Fire Element attack.

H.Old:
MP Cost: 75 and 1 Feather of Phoenix per sec.
Periodically attacks up to 12 enemies at 1100% damage 8 times. Critical Rate +50% and Ignore DEF +50%.
1 Feather of Phoenix is generated every 12 sec. Can have up to 10 Feathers.
Cooldown: 2500 sec.
H.New:
Cost: 75 MP and 1 Feather of Phoenix per sec.
Periodically attacks up to 12 enemies at 1100% Damage 8 times. Additional Critical Rate: 50%. Additional Ignore Monster DEF: 50%.
1 Feather of Phoenix is ready every 12 sec. and up to 10 can be carried.
If used while a Flame Fox is summoned, Feather of Phoenix cost per sec. x2 times and skill Final Damage +100%.
Cooldown: 2500 sec.
